name: Sejuani
title: Fury of the North
lore: Sejuani is the brutal, unforgiving Iceborn warmother of the Winter's Claw, one of the most feared tribes of the Freljord. Her people's survival is a constant, desperate battle against the elements, forcing them to raid Noxians, Demacians, and Avarosans alike to survive the harsh winters. Sejuani herself spearheads the most dangerous of these attacks from the saddle of her dr√ºvask boar Bristle, using her True Ice flail to freeze and shatter her enemies.
blurb: Sejuani is the brutal, unforgiving Iceborn warmother of the Winter's Claw, one of the most feared tribes of the Freljord. Her people's survival is a constant, desperate battle against the elements, forcing them to raid Noxians, Demacians, and Avarosans...
allytips: Use Arctic Assault to escape bad situations, interupt channeled spells or chase runners.
Melee allies can stack Frost for your Permafrost, keep an eye on who they are attacking.
Save Glacial Prison for encounters where you have teammates present to take advantage of it.
enemytips: Dodging Arctic Assault and Glacial Prison can give you a huge advantage.
Focus on avoiding the second swing of Winter's Wrath which carries the brunt of the damage.
Melee enemies can also stack Frost for Sejuani, be very careful around them.

riot_spell_q.name: Arctic Assault
riot_spell_q.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: Sejuani charges, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to enemies and knocking them up. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.

riot_spell_w.name: Winter's Wrath
riot_spell_w.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Sejuani swings her flail, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) physical damage and applying Frost to enemies hit and knocking minions and monsters back.

She then lashes out with her flail, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ f4 }}) physical damage, applying Frost and slowing enemies hit briefly.

riot_spell_e.name: Permafrost
riot_spell_e.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions, large monsters, medium monsters, and large minions.

Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s), and is briefly displaced.

Enemy champions stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for {{ f2 }} seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Glacial Prison
riot_spell_r.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second.

The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, stunning for {{ e6 }} seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by {{ e8 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

riot_spell_i.name: Fury of the North
riot_spell_i.description: <mainText>After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.</mainText>

wikia_skill_i1.name: Fury of the North
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Frost Armor:}} '''Sejuani''' receives [[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' if she hasn't taken damage from large [[monster]]s and enemy [[champion]]s in the last 12 seconds, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: [[File:Sejuani Frost Armor.png|18px|link=]] ''Frost Armor'' engulfs {{ui|Bristle}} in True Ice, becoming [[Slow resist#Slow Immunity|immune]] to {{tip|slow|slows}} and gains {{sti|armor|{{as|20 (+ 25% '''bonus''' armor) '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|20 (+ 25% '''bonus''' magic resistance) '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: {{sbc|Icebreaker:}} Enemies {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' are ''Frozen''. '''Sejuani's''' basic attacks and abilities against ''Frozen'' enemies consume the effect to deal {{as|{{pp|3|10 to 20|1;7;14|key=%}} of their '''maximum''' health}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}, capped to 300 against epic monsters.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Arctic Assault
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' signals {{ui|Bristle}} to {{tip|dash}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all enemies hit for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. The charge will prematurely end upon colliding with an enemy [[champion]].
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* Champions will slightly be {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}, while [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s will instead be slightly {{tip|airborne|pulled}} for a fixed distance.
* ''Arctic Assault'' cannot {{tip|airborne|knock}} enemies over terrain.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Winter's Wrath
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.25}}-seconds delay, '''Sejuani''' swings her flail in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies hit and {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} minions and monsters.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 2% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description2: She then lashes out with her flail after {{fd|0.75}} seconds in a straight line in the same direction, dealing additional {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit by 75% for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|30 to 190}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|(+ 6% of her '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20+30 to 40+190}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|(+ 8% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description3: '''Sejuani''' can move freely during ''Winter's Wrath''. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow '''Sejuani's''' movement.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the swing or the lash.
* The ability's cooldown starts after both flail attacks are completed.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Permafrost
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} {{ai|Winter's Wrath|Sejuani}} and both '''Sejuani's''' and {{tt|nearby|1100 range}} allied {{tip|melee}} champions' basic attacks apply ''Frost'' to enemy champions, epic, large and medium monsters, super minions and siege minions for 5 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} If the targeted enemy has 4 stacks of ''Frost'', '''Sejuani''' consumes all stacks to deal {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|knockdown|knock them down}}, and {{tip|stun}} them for 1 second.
wikia_skill_e1.description3: Enemy champions {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' cannot gain ''Frost'' for {{pp|3|10 to 8|1;7;14}} seconds.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Glacial Prison
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' throws a True Ice bola in the target direction, stopping at the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|knockdown|knocking them down}}, and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 150}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Empowered Magic Damage|{{ap|150 to 350}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description2: The bola deals increased damage, {{tip|stun|stuns}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and shatters upon reaching maximum range or upon colliding with a unit beyond {{tt|400 range|estimated}}, creating a storm for 2 seconds that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies by 30%.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: At the end of the duration the storm shatters the ground, dealing the same damage and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies by 80% for 1 second.
wikia_skill_r1.description4: The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Glacial Prison'' affects minions only if they are within detonation radius.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.
* The {{tip|stun}} will apply {{tip|single target}} spell effect, while the storm will apply {{tip|area of effect}} spell damage.
* The True Ice bola is always thrown at maximum range.
* The True Ice bola does not collide with terrain.
* The True Ice bola applies the freeze immunity of {{ai|Permafrost|Sejuani}} when {{tip|stun|stunning}} a champion.
